ResearchProjectDef.label: large cannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build manned large cannons that has a long range and a very high accuracy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 6Pdr Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 6 Pounder Cannon Turret based on A.E.C Deacon Turret . Capable of using AP shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 88mm Cannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned 88mm Cannon based on Flak 88 AA/Artillery Gun. Capable of using HE and AP shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: large autocannons
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build manned large autocannons that has a long range and a very high accuracy.

ResearchProjectDef.label: Single 40mm Autocannon
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 40mm autocannon based on M1 Bofors AA gun. Needs a 4x40mm Ammo Clip and has a storage of about 20 clips.

ResearchProjectDef.label: howitzers
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build large howitzers that launches massive high explosive shells over buildings.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 60cm Howitzer
ResearchProjectDef.description: A massive 60cm howitzer based on "Karl Gerat" Railway gun.

ResearchProjectDef.label: naval guns
ResearchProjectDef.description: Build large naval guns that are equipped with autoloading system and has armored casing.

ResearchProjectDef.label: 100mm naval gun
ResearchProjectDef.description: A manned single 100mm naval gun turret that uses a belt-feed ammo consists of 100 shells.

ResearchProjectDef.label: unmanned combat module
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows you to research and build the unmanned variant of each cannon types.
